oai_dc:dc.dc:title: ixa-pipe-coref-eu
oai_dc:dc.dc:description:
ixa-pipe-coref-eu is a Basque coreference resolution tool, which is an adaptation of Stanford Deterministic Coreference Resolution (http://www-nlp.stanford.edu/downloads/dcoref.shtml).
This tool reads a text document annotated with lemmas, named entities and constituents formated in Natural Language Processing Annotation Format (NAF) (http://wordpress.let.vupr.nl/naf/) and outputs a new NAF document.
This tool is partly funded by the European Commission project QTLeap FP7-ICT-2013.4.1-610516 (http://qtleap.eu). This tool is distributed under the license GPL v3.0.
